extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  A grade of C in ENGL100 (or ENGL110) or registration in a GNDS plan

basic.description: This course will explore how different literary works represent desire, romance, queerness, and other gender-related issues. Particular focus may vary from year to year; for detailed information, consult the Department.
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Literature and Gender
